name: Sandy Lennart
role: Marketing Director at Scott Park Group
comment: We've had the pleasure of working with Kobe for several years, and he has consistently delivered outstanding results. From CRM set up and management to driving exceptional results from our digital marketing lead generation and brand campaigns. We've thrown some challenging projects his way and he’s tackled them with intelligence, patience, and strategic insight. His ability to navigate complex problems and provide effective solutions has been invaluable to our group. We highly recommend Kobe to anyone looking for a knowledgeable and reliable partner in digital marketing and CRM systems.

name: Brigid Barbaro
comment: Working with Kobe has been great for our hospitality business and improving it’s tech side of things & developing our e-comm store. He’s keen to make clients happy, takes feedback well & adapts quickly to meet his clients needs. I’m positive to foresee a long-term business relationship with him.

name: Alice Johnson
comment: I recently started working with Positivus and have been very impressed with their professionalism and expertise. They have helped me increase my online visibility and generate more leads for my business. I highly recommend Positivus to anyone looking to improve their online marketing strategy.

name: Bob Brown
comment: Positivus has been a great partner for our company. They are knowledgeable, responsive, and truly care about the success of our business. We have seen a significant increase in website traffic and leads as a result of their efforts. I highly recommend Positivus to any company looking to grow their online presence.

comment: I have been working with Positivus for the past year and have been very impressed with their professionalism and expertise. They have helped me increase my online visibility and generate more leads for my business. I highly recommend Positivus to anyone looking to improve their online marketing strategy.
